document_data.name: Companions of the Silver Strings
document_data.orgname: the Companions of the Silver Strings
document_data.mainbody: The '''Companions of the Silver Strings''' were an order of [[bard]]s devoted to [[Oghma]], the Lord of Knowledge.
document_data.Activities: The members of the Companions of the Silver Strings were particularly valiant, often risking their lives in service to the [[church of Oghma]].
